The workshop will be held __July 14-15__, 2025 in Building 10 at the NIH Campus in Bethesda, MD.

### Instructors

- Neggin Keshavarazian (Princeton University)
- Amy Schuler (Cary Institute of Ecosystem Studies)
- Mariah Kenney (Carnegie Mellon University)
- Kelly Grove (Florida State University)
- Tim Norris (University of Miami)

   - Download the [1_Environment_Setup_Datasets.zip](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1JQF03Ekmpsvv4tICg6ELMISpPKBCZMXk) adapted from [Kramer et al 2019](https://doi.org/10.13020/znag-tn48).
